comment._content:
Name: Lorenzo Hawkins
Age at enlistment: 18
Enlistment Date: 15 Aug 1862
Rank at enlistment: Private
State Served: New Hampshire
Was Wounded?: Yes
Survived the War?: Yes
Service Record: Enlisted in Company I, New Hampshire 12th Infantry Regiment on 09 Sep 1862.
Mustered out (Deserted) on 21 Jul 1863 at Annapolis, MD.
Birth Date: abt 1844
Sources: Register of Soldiers and Sailors of New Hampshire 1861-65

Source: Ancestery.com
